europeana:record.dc:title: Catalogue of the sub-Saharan species of the genus Seladonia Robertson, 1918, with description of two new species (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Halictidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Pauly A.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Seladonia
Halictidae
sub-Saharan Africa
lectotype designation
new species
europeana:record.dc:description: This paper is a synonymic catalogue of the 18 species of the genus Seladonia Robertson, 1918 (Apoidea: Halictidae) from sub-Saharan Africa. Two new species are described: S. cyanella spec. nov., a small blue endemic species of the Yemeno-Erythrean area^S. kuhlmanni spec. nov., an endemic species of the species rich South African Karoo. Lectotypes are designated for Halictus atroviridis Cameron, 1906, H. capensis Friese, 1909, H. jucundus Smith, 1853 and H. chalybaeus Friese, 1925.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Catalogue of the sub-Saharan species of the genus Seladonia Robertson, 1918, with description of two new species (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Halictidae) (URN:ISSN:00240672) (Volume 82) (Issue 36)
